name.zh: Garena AI toolbox - for offices except CN
name.en: Garena AI toolbox - for offices except CN

description.zh: （适用除中国以外地区）整合了公司目前可以使用的内部及外部工具
description.en: (Applicable to regions other than China) Integrates the internal and external tools currently available to the company

zh: 各类工具说明/链接/申请方式

remarks.en: The AI team is responsible for maintenance and updates

name.zh: Garena AI工具箱 - for CN office
name.en: Garena AI Toolbox - for CN office

description.zh: （适用中国地区）整合了公司目前可以使用的内部及外部工具
description.en: (Applicable to China) Integrates the internal and external tools currently available to the company

zh: 各类工具说明/链接/申请方式

remarks.en: The AI team is responsible for maintenance and updates

description.zh: 收录由上海 Web 团队研发的 AI 工具合集
description.en: A collection of AI tools developed by the Shanghai Web Team

zh: 上海Web Team研发的各类工具
en: Various tools developed by Shanghai Web Team

remarks.zh: 部分工具还在内测期，仅限内网使用，权限或者账号申请请联系Web PM
remarks.en: Some tools are still in the beta stage and are only available on the intranet. Please contact Web PM for permission or account application.

description.zh: 一键将 Google Slides 中的文字翻译为其他语言
description.en: Translate text in Google Slides into other languages with one click

zh: 可以生成翻译初稿（建议生成后再自行微调）

remarks.zh:
安装add on后功能可以在slide - extension菜单开启
目前使用的是机器语言翻译而非AI
remarks.en:
After installing add on, the function can be enabled in the slide - extension menu
Currently using machine language translation instead of AI

description.zh: 公司内部知识库平台，可以安全输入机密数据
description.en: Internal knowledge base platform for companies to safely input confidential data

zh: 基于 RAG（检索增强生成）的知识检索与问答工具，支持上传结构化知识文件，打造专家型机器人
兼容多种文件格式，包括 PDF
Google Docs 和网页
技术/产品机器人：学习内部技术和产品内容，支持信息检索和团队协作
en: A knowledge retrieval and question-answering tool based on RAG (Retrieval Enhanced Generation)
which supports uploading structured knowledge files and creating expert robots

remarks.zh: 目前已经支持Google Drive自动更新
remarks.en: Google Drive automatic updates are now supported

description.zh: 支持带时间轴的 SRT 字幕文件一键翻译
description.en: Support one-click translation of SRT subtitle files with timeline

zh: 部署于本地 DIFY 服务器，仅限内网访问
字幕生成推荐使用剪映（需会员），中文识别准确度较高
建议翻译前由 GPT 进行“去水词”处理以提升质量
en: Deployed on a local DIFY server
It is recommended to use Jianying (membership required) for subtitle generation
which has a higher accuracy in Chinese recognition

remarks.zh:
功能更新中
建议总条数<1500条
remarks.en:
Function is being updated
The total number of recommended items is less than 1500

description.zh: 由SG Team开发的String文件翻译
description.en: String file translation developed by SG Team

zh: 支持多语言互译（如中译英
泰译中等）
en: Support multi-language translation (such as Chinese to English

remarks.zh: 与SRT文件翻译功能类似，可以二选一
remarks.en: Similar to the SRT file translation function, you can choose one of the two

name.zh: PPT口播稿生成+口播稿转语音工具
name.en: PPT script generation + script to speech tool

description.zh: 适用于本地化视频内容制作，提升效率
description.en: Applicable to localized video content production to improve efficiency

zh: 传 PDF 后自动生成 PPT 讲稿
可生成中英文语音播报
en: Automatically generate PPT presentation after uploading PDF
Can generate Chinese and English voice broadcast

remarks.en: Cannot edit text at this time

description.zh: 可用于图片绘制/海报制作
description.en: Can be used for picture drawing/poster making

zh: 基于 GPT-Image 和 Flux (ComfuUI) 的 AI 图像处理工具
支持风格迁移
重绘
扩绘
en: AI image processing tool based on GPT-Image and Flux (ComfuUI)

name.en: One-click desensitization of sensitive PPT content

description.zh: 自动替换 PPT 中的敏感信息，并生成副本
description.en: Automatically replace sensitive information in PPT and generate a copy

zh: 用于PPT文件一键脱敏，方便内部交流
en: Used for one-click desensitization of PPT files to facilitate internal communication

description.en: AI audio generation platform based on Azure/ElevenLabs

zh: 可用于语音文件生成
en: Can be used to generate voice files

description.zh: AI 驱动的笔记整理与问答助手，支持围绕自定义资料生成学习内容和个性化辅导
description.en: AI-driven note-taking and Q&A assistant that supports generating learning content and personalized tutoring around custom materials

zh: 将课程讲义
项目文档或FAQ上传至 NotebookLM，系统会自动整理为结构化知识点并生成可对话的问答系统
适用于 课后自学
知识复习
en: project documents or FAQs to NotebookLM

remarks.zh: 公司员工均可使用（部分地区需要切换IP）
remarks.en: All company employees can use it (some areas need to switch IP)

description.zh: 由 Google Workspace 推出的 AI 视频创作工具，用于快速生成教学视频或培训内容
description.en: AI video creation tool launched by Google Workspace for quickly generating instructional videos or training content

zh: 仅需提供文案或课程要点，Google Vids 可自动生成教学脚本
视频结构
画面和配音建议，显著降低视频制作门槛
适合用于制作 微课（bite-size learning）
en: Just provide the copy or course highlights
Google Vids can automatically generate teaching scripts

description.zh:
功能包括图生视频、文生视频等
支持运镜控制、运动笔刷、对口型等，视频质量最高可达1080p
description.en: Functions include image-generated video, text-generated video, etc. Supports camera control, motion brush, lip syncing, etc., and the video quality can reach up to 1080p

zh: 适合生成宣传视频制作
en: Suitable for generating promotional video production

remarks.zh:
工具申请提交IT center
关于知识产权，在输出内容中，除了我们原本就有知识产权的内容（比如上传的Kelly形象），可灵不会授予我们其它内容的知识产权。因此应格外注意上传我们已经有版权的内容，确保我们拥有输出内容的版权。
remarks.en:
Tool application submission IT center
Regarding intellectual property rights, in the output content, except for the content that we already have intellectual property rights (such as the uploaded Kelly image), Keling will not grant us the intellectual property rights of other content. Therefore, we should pay special attention to uploading content that we already have copyright to ensure that we own the copyright of the output content.

description.zh: 集成了多个前沿LLM，通过智能补全、代码review、重构建议、注释生成等功能提升coding体验和效率
description.en: Integrates multiple cutting-edge LLMs to improve coding experience and efficiency through intelligent completion, code review, refactoring suggestions, comment generation and other functions

zh: 适合独立工具制作，web页面开发，数据处理和脚本撰写

remarks.zh:
本网站由Cursor协助完成！
工具申请提交IT center
remarks.en:
This website is assisted by Cursor! 
Submit tool application to IT center
